AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Puppet master
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In [PAWN_possessive] first transit to another planet, [PAWN_nameDef] was captured and enslaved by a crime gang. Using [PAWN_possessive] psychic abilities, [PAWN_nameDef] was not only able to get out of enslavement but even join the crime gang. In a month [PAWN_pronoun] was a vital part of the gang, finding where prey was hiding, finding moles and inspiring men but that wasn’t good enough for [PAWN_objective]. In a year [PAWN_pronoun] orchestrated a coup and took over the gang and all without ever picking up a gun.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Privateer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Wealth and status, the two things that matter most to a slug and by becoming a privateer you can ascertain both. On shore leave [PAWN_nameDef] could brag to all the honeys about all the perilous battles [PAWN_pronoun]’s been on protecting the borders of the slug worlds. When on the job [PAWN_pronoun] could take [PAWN_possessive] part of the loot from the poor little refugee ship that the slugs needed “protection” from.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engi helper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Taking apart machines and putting them back together can be a real pain in the neck, more so if the machine only has a loose screw. That's why [PAWN_nameDef] put [PAWN_possessive] telekinetic predispositions to use, starting a business in an engi mechanical centre. [PAWN_nameDef] felt needed and valuable fixing tiny little issues in a blink of an eye for [PAWN_possessive] engi friends, especially when they gave [PAWN_objective] the nickname TimeSaver [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Farm saver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Persuaded by some kind Federation humans to become part of something bigger than [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Federation red cross. A non-profit organisation aimed at reducing galactic suffering, [PAWN_nameDef]'s division was food production. [PAWN_pronoun] would be sent down to with teams of biologists, farmers and fellow revitaliser slugs to save poverty stricken planets of doomed ecosystems and poor harvests.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Circus performer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ship crashed landed onto a primitive world where [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by a travelling circus. Suddenly the star performer in a freak show, [PAWN_nameDef] didn’t really know what to make of [PAWN_possessive] life. However, feeling the happiness that emanates from the crowd was like a drug to [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] soon became addicted. So despite the terrible food, hygiene and disease [PAWN_nameDef] didn’t think it was all that bad. Apart from the wild animal performances though, those scared [PAWN_objective].
